name: Big Game Haunting
description:
Some folks think ghosts is not real- but we all know they are, if you have the right equipment!

Big Game Haunting is a paranormal hunting sim set in the woods at night.

Use your equipment to find and shoot as many ghosts as possible!

Team Name: Ghost Haunters

Members: Ricky Cruz, (rickycruzmedia@gmail.com) Sam Wurth, (kingregicon@gmail.com) Andrew Clancy, (apclancy21@gmail.com) David Budke (chip@chipgw.com)

Precreated Content-

Sounds provided by Freesound.org, (CC0 license) and Soundly!

Everything else was created by us.
